entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon then becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023
